Sentencas: We compare the environmental side effects of power plants based on fuel cell technology with the side effects of conventional electric power plants based on coal and natural gas.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: The environmental impact of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) plant is very much less than that of a coal-fired plant (a factor of 1/300 for air pollution and a factor of 1/5 for water pollution).
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: Compared with a conventional gas plant, impact is reduced by between 50 and 98%.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: Damage to cultural monuments and buildings is negligible from a fuel cell plant.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: Socioeconomic negative impacts are reduced by about 30% relative to conventional gas plants (aesthetics and noise) whereas employment is unaltered.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: Impact on health and safety is greatly reduced compared with that from coal-fired plants and is about 70% of that from conventional gas plants.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: Preliminary results suggest that society's willingness to pay (WTP) for clean air, and thereby better health, matches the cost of installing emission-reducing equipment on conventional power plants.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: There is probably an additional WTP for other benefits (e.g., decreased risk of global warming).
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY

Sentencas: Thus, the utility of very small emissions, lower CO2 discharges, and other benefits from SOFC generators may compensate for the increased cost incurred in producing electricity by SOFC generators.
Titulo: ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACTS OF ENERGY FACILITIES - FUEL-CELL TECHNOLOGY COMPARED WITH COAL AND CONVENTIONAL GAS TECHNOLOGY
